H0.text: Sediment is nearly absent from the rocks at the mid‑ocean ridge.

H1.text: Minerals are nearly free of the rocks at the mid‑ocean ridge.

H2.text: Scratches are nearly absent from the rocks at the mid‑ocean ridge.

H3.text: Metals are nearly absent from the rocks at the mid-ocean ridge.

A4.text: sediment is usually thin or even not present near the mid-ocean ridges
